description:
I'm leading a backend team who has to develop the new hotel platform.
I'm in charge of the integration with different suppliers like Expedia, Juniper and Booking.com. I'm also in charge of both the designed API and the whole backend solution.

I was in charge of a small back-end team. I was responsible of the integrations with different OTA compliant providers, mainly focused on multithreading programming, high availability and scalability.
Using techs like MongoDB, Java8, AngularJS, SpringMVC, RestFull services, etc.
I was in charge of the design and development of different automative industry systems using a simple stack based on Flex, Spring, Hibernate, etc.
I was part of a development team working on automative industry systems and using a simple stack based on Struts, Spring, Hibernate, etc.
I was part of a development team working on automative industry systems and using a simple stack based on Struts, Spring, Hibernate, etc.
I worked as a java developer for different financial projects, I was mainly focused on front-end technologies like Swing and Struts.
